nodes.text: Purge: The Tyrant's Fist, Part 1 is a comic book published by Dark Horse Comics on December 5, 2012. It is the first issue of a two-part story arc, part of a series of comics covering the adventures of Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader after the fall of the Galactic Republic and the Jedi. This story was preceded by Star Wars: Purge, Star Wars: Purge: Seconds to Die and Star Wars: Purge: The Hidden Blade.

Shortly after the birth of the Empire, Vader master of combat, terror of his enemies, continues his purge of the Jedi Knights on a planet where his Jedi prey are revered. Amidst a planetwide insurgency, the Dark Lord must snuff out one surviving Jedi, as well as kill the fire of rebellion in the native populace. All will bow to the power of Vader and the Galactic Empire!
